title: Master of Ceremony - Education Fair 2024
responsibilities: Engaged the audience with a lively and interactive hosting style, ensuring a smooth flow of the event
Introduced speakers and performers, providing context and background to enhance audience understanding
Facilitated Q&A sessions, encouraging audience participation and fostering a dynamic atmosphere

title: Secretary - Mooncake Festival 2022
responsibilities: Manage events with a total of more than 300 invitations, and sign invitations for other organizations
Coordinated communication among event organizers, volunteers, and participants to ensure everyone was informed and aligned with event plans
Assisted in the logistical planning of the festival, contributing to the successful execution of the event and ensuring a memorable experience for attendees
